叴字的基本解释

叴
qiú
〔叴叴〕傲气逼人的样子，如“（四壁金刚）如有气叴叴，如叱叱有声。”

叴字的汉语字典释义

[①]［qiú］
［《廣韻》巨鳩切，平尤，羣。］
(1)三隅矛。
(2)见“叴叴”。

叴字的康熙字典解释

【丑集上】【口字部】　叴； 康熙笔画：5； 页码：页173第07
【唐韻】巨鳩切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】渠尤切，?音求。【說文】高氣也。　又叴猶，縣名。【前漢·地理志】臨淮郡叴猶縣。【正字通】漢叴猶，今之泗州。　又叴由，狄國。【戰國策】智伯欲伐叴由，遺之大鐘，載以廣車，因隨入以兵。【註】括地志云：幷州孟縣外城，俗名仇由。史記樗里子傳作仇猶，韓非子作仇繇，吕覽作?繇。【正字通】今太原府孟縣有仇猶城，卽此。　又三隅矛曰叴。【詩·秦風】叴矛鋈錞。【正韻】詩厹矛，下从厶，與叴不同。監本叴字云三隅矛，誤。○按《廣韻》《集韻》俱云：叴、厹同。《正韻》强分爲二，泥。又?、禸，同。

叴字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体旧字形
叴字的起名意思

暂无。

叴
Basic explanation of words
叴
qiú
〔叴叴] An arrogant and compelling look, such as "(Four-Walled King Kong) If there is anger, like a scream."
叴
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［qiú］
["Guangyun" Giant Dove Cut, Ping You, Group. ]
(1) Three-cornered spear.
(2) See "叴叴".
叴
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chou Ji 1] [Words Department] 　叴; Kangxi Strokes: 5; Page Number: Page 173 No. 07
[Tang Yun] Giant Dove Cut [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] [Zheng Yun] Qu You cut, please? [Said the text] High-spirited.　 Then again, the county name. [Pre-Han Geography] Linhuai County, Guyou County. 【Zhengzitong】The Han Dynasty is still very old, and now it is Sizhou.　Knowing again, Di Guo. [Warring States Policy] Zhibo wanted to attack the cause, and the big bell left was carried by a car, and because it was accompanied by soldiers. [Note] Including geographies: Outer city of Meng County, Yizhou, commonly known as Qiu You. In the Records of the Records of History, Qiu Lizi was passed down as Qiu You, Han Feizi was Qiu You, and Lu Lan was Zuo You. [Zhengzitong] Today, Meng County, Taiyuan Prefecture, has Qiu Youcheng.　Misumi spear said again. [Poetry·Qin Feng] 叴鋈鋈錞. [Zhengyun] Poems and spears are different from 叴. Supervising this word cloud three corners of the spear, wrong. ○According to "Guang Yun" and "Ji Yun" all the words: 叴、厹同. "Zheng Yun" is strongly divided into two, mud. Again?, 禸, the same.
